title: DELL Inspiron 15R (n5110) Intel® Core™ i3 i3-2350M 39.6 cm (15.6") 4 GB DDR3-SDRAM 500 GB HDD NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 525M FreeDOS Black
description:
DELL Inspiron 15R (n5110) Intel® Core™ i3 i3-2350M 39.6 cm (15.6") 4 GB DDR3-SDRAM 500 GB HDD NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 525M FreeDOS Black


A laptop as unique as you are Switchable lid designs Personalize your laptop with SWITCH by Design Studio. Change your look as you please with optional interchangeable lids. 2nd Generation Intel® Core™ processors Meet your everyday computing needs with 2nd Generation Intel® Core™ processors. Entertainment virtually anywhere An HD (high-definition) display, webcam and Intel® Wireless Display capabilities help keep the fun going wherever you are. Your world on one Stage Dell™ Stage software on your Inspiron™ R delivers the things that matter to you right to your laptop, with your most recent content always front and center. Seamlessly toggle between your favorite music, videos, applications and more, all from a sleek, movie-reel-style interface. Faster than the speed of life Edit photos and video, play games and stay connected with friends and family. Inspiron™ R laptops are designed to meet your everyday computing needs, with power to spare. The speed you need: - Windows® 7 Home Premium. - Seamlessly multitask and quickly access your files and programs with up to 2nd Gen Intel® Core™ i7 processors Smart, powerful graphics Boost visual performance with optional intelligent graphics. Upgraded Inspiron R laptops use high-performance video cards for graphics-intensive applications like playing games or watching HD movies. When you need less power, your laptop automatically switches to an integrated card — delivering more performance on a single battery charge. Store it all (and then some): Inspiron R laptops deliver large-capacity hard drives with more than enough space for your music, videos and photos.

title: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 Intel Core Ultra 7 155U Laptop 35.6 cm (14") Touchscreen 2.8K 32 GB LPDDR5x-SDRAM 1 TB SSD Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) Windows 11 Pro Slovenian Black
description:
Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 Intel Core Ultra 7 155U Laptop 35.6 cm (14") Touchscreen 2.8K 32 GB LPDDR5x-SDRAM 1 TB SSD Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) Windows 11 Pro Slovenian Black


How Do You Show Respect for the Planet? The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 (14ʺ Intel) laptop still uses carbon fiber for the chassis — but better yet some of that carbon fiber is recycled from post-industrial remnants and is used along with 90% recycled magnesium. Plus, the chassis, the battery pack, the speaker enclosure, and the power adapter all include recycled post-consumer content. And we don’t stop there. The packaging is 100% plastic-free and comprised in part with rapid-renewable materials made from bamboo-sugar-cane fiber. Elevated Performance & Lasting Battery The ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 boasts the world’s first laptop powered by Intel® Core™ Ultra processors, making it ideal for creating and on-the-go productivity. Enjoy optimized performance with workloads pushed to dedicated AI engines, including the low-power neural processing unit (NPU) for sustained tasks and resiliant battery life. Go ahead, turn on auto-framing or low-light enhancement for your online meetings, even when unplugged! Choose the Intel vPro® Evo™ Edition, for multilayer security, professional-grade performance, reliable stability, and complete management for IT. Raise the Bar on Collaboration A Communications Bar, positioned at the top of the display for easy laptop opening, houses two cameras (FHD / infrared (IR)) — or upgrade to the premium 8MP & IR Mobile Industry Processor Interface (MIPI) with Computer Vision — both options include a webcam privacy shutter. Additionally, two 360-degree mics with AI-based noise cancellation, combined with Dolby Voice® and Dolby Atmos® deliver a superb audio experience. Plus, the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 is Zoom-certified. Make calls, listen to music, or watch a video and enjoy the sublime sounds. You Spoke. We Listened: We’ve Redesigned Our Legendary Keyboard Our redesigned ThinkPad keyboard now includes tactile markings to help people with visual impairments more easily find the correct keys. We’ve moved the fingerprint reader to the keyboard, resulting in a larger sensor for a better experience. Plus, our TrackPad is even larger now, at 120mm / 4.72ʺ. Our beloved red TrackPoint still lets you navigate — but with a double tap, it opens the ThinkPad TrackPoint Quick Menu to optimize audio-visuals, set alerts against muting, and even take notes with the Dictation Toolbar for handy speech-to-text transcription. A Feast for the Eyes Razor-thin bezels frame an optional stunning 14ʺ 2.8K OLED display with 120Hz refresh rate. Sharp, clear details make content pop and colors more vibrant than ever on the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 laptop, especially when driven by optional high-performance Intel® Arc™ graphics. But perhaps the best part yet? It’s easy on the eyes with Eyesafe® certification, so you can put in the long hours to meet your deadlines and not worry about eye-strain and fatigue. Engineered for a No-Compromise Experience The Intel® Evo™ Edition, ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 laptop is engineered to do it all. Experience all-day battery life, instant wake, and best-in-class connectivity. No matter what tasks you tackle, this device is highly responsive. Plus, with Intel® Unison™, you can sync your laptop with any iOS or Android smartphone and then call or text, and even transfer files, photos, and videos all from the convenience of your PC. Unleash Software Superpowers Get the most out of your device with preinstalled Lenovo apps. Lenovo View is an AI-based camera app that enhances video quality and provides intelligent collaboration, privacy, and digital wellness features. Lenovo Vantage centralizes settings to safeguard data, automate updates, and improve performance — or Lenovo Commercial Vantage for IT manageability. We make it easier and safer to do your job well. Stand Tough With Battle-Tested ThinkPad We use the US Department of Defense's MIL-STD 810H to create a balance of reliability and durability for ThinkPad laptops. Meeting or exceeding 12 standards, 26 procedures, and 200+ quality checks ensure that these devices run in extreme conditions, including harsh variables like Arctic wilderness, desert dust storms, extreme temps, pressure, humidity, vibration, and more. Your Face. Your Fingerprint. Your Fortress. Biometrics provide extra protection on the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 laptop, from the fingerprint reader to facial recognition software. ThinkShield, our comprehensive suite of security solutions, boasts discrete Trusted Platform Module (dTPM) to safeguard critical data with encryption. Plus, AI-powered Intel® Threat Detection Technology helps prevent ransomware, cryptojacking, and more. When it comes to security and protecting your assets, we’ve got you covered! Specifications may vary depending upon region / model.
